title: Mandelbrot
subtitle: fractal visualization tool
desc: Full stack app that allows users to explore the mandelbrot fractal. Renders images with any level of zoom and precision using custom big decimal implementation.
shortDesc: Full stack app that allows users to explore the mandelbrot fractal.

title: Lucida
subtitle: chess engine
desc: Fully functional chess engine, developed from scratch using Node. Uses an alpha beta search with iterative deepening, described in detail in the repository.
shortDesc: Fully functional chess engine, developed from scratch using Node.

title: Visual Sorting
subtitle: algorithm learning tool
desc: Modular and scalable design. Utilizes centralized state management through Redux, and takes advantage of aynchronous actions using Redux-Thunk. Includes bubble sort, quick sort, and merge sort.
shortDesc: Modular and scalable design. Includes bubble sort, quick sort, and merge sort.
